title: Pls help
body:
I have no idea where this new client saves my replays. This new replay system. I searched for this folder entire day and i cant find it. Nothing.
Can you give me a clue where can this replay folder be? (in League Of Legends folder - all i know){{item:3070}}

replies.body: go into ur mathc history hit the circle thing at the end next to your score and then it downloads it and hit it again to watch the replay
i know. but i recorded replay. i cant find the folder with those recordings
it shows that it is saved somewhere... but i cant find it

*Replays* (whole matches) are stored in **C:\Users\Example_Username\My Documents\League of Legends\Replays**

Whereas, *Highlights* (Recorded Gameplay from a Replay) are stored here: **C:\Users\Example_Username\My Documents\League of Legends\Highlights**

Let me know if you have any questions.
oh go into ur folders and search league of legends and it'll be an icon of a fodler with documents and it has ur replay files
